display.title: Tier 4 Rocket
display.description:
Get into space! Use biodiesel from Immersive Engineering or biodisel/diesel from Pneumatic Craft as rocket fuel.

The Tier 4 Rocket is the fourth and final rocket the player can craft so far. It is made of Calorite (a rare material found on Venus), and can travel to any planet, including the new planet Galacio.
